body.p: With a feeling of joy, we inform the public that the board of trustees of the Holy Trinity Church has finally decided to build a new school building on the lot belonging to the church. There already are two building on this lot. One is used as a school....and one is used as a private dwelling. The school committee was trying to decide whether to (1) remodel the two buildings at a cost of about $6,000; (2) build a wing joining the two buildings at a cost of about $10,000; or (3) build a new building from the ground up. An architect has estimated the cost to be about $28,000.

After much deliberation, the third plan was decided upon by the committee. The Atlas Exchange National Bank, whose treasurer is Mr. Nick Kyriakopoulos, ....has offered financial assistance by making a loan and by issuing bonds.
The community, especially all parents, must support the efforts of the committee. This is one of the finest things that has ever been decided upon by a church board. Forward to progress!
